title: 8/2 in Provisionals, DEMOTED!?!?!?

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body: So... Season 5, i was SIlver V, 100lp 4 game win streak. Then season 6 hits, i go 8/2 and im demoted down to bronze 1? Check my lolking stats, but, I had more kills than deaths in every one of those wins, and im a support main. My mastery was above B+ in almost every game. I just don't understand how this works? In season 3 I placed in bronze. In season 4 i fought out of bronze to silver. In season 5 i got demoted to bronze, and fought back to silver. Now im demoted back down to bronze for NO REASON!?!?! Im sick of fighting my way out of bronze I elo HELL. This has got to be a mistake right? Riot? PLEASE!?!?! I BEG OF YOU... i thought the point was, if you go 5/5 you stay where you are. If you do worse or better, you get demoted or promoted accordingly... HELP!?!?!

replies.body:
@CL:

I was at Silver 2 last season. After placement (6-4), I am in Bronze 1 now.

It is pretty easy for me to get back to silver since I am from high silver.
I have checked your match history, you are indeed good support.
Come duo with me getting up to silver.

Add me in game: RonyStark

I play at night only: 8pm+ AEST

The first few games have the biggest impact, also I'm very sure that you get placed in a lower rank than where your mmr is at. This is to probably stop luckers getting good divisions off placements. If you're any good of a player you will easily climb out. If you can't then you obviously don't belong in silver.
100000000% this. Anyone who complains about being placed in Bronze when they were Silver last year, probably doesn't deserve Silver. I went from Bronze to Silver three times last year with ease.

Not being mean, just pointing out the flaw in your statement,
you say it was easy getting to silver 3 times. what completely negates that statement was that you actually needed to get to silver 3 times.

Oh no no dude, I get that. It's always really wierd when I tell people that coz it's both good and bad BUT, the reason I kept dropping back down at one point was because I have EXTREMELY pms-y internet and I dc quite often, even now lol

Im already back in Silver IV, if you check my LKS, which is a decent representation of MMR, it falls off massively into bronze for like... a day, and then shoots back up into silver... tell me that's not a glitch. http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/332033#profile
It might be because your mmr was low last season. Also its usually win 7/10 to stay where your mmr is.

I just finished my provisionals for season 6 after finishing season 5 in silver 4 and I went 8/2 in my provisionals and was demoted to bronze 3. I really give up with this game with all the trolls and afks and now this? I give up
